alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:51PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern White, western Gibson and northwestern Posey Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 750 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grayville to near Crossville to near Carmi. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grayville around 755 PM CDT. New Harmony around 810 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 9. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 126 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
